ctu_text: \n", "briefDescription": "A scheme by Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas for Providing free LPG connections to women belonging to the Below Poverty Line (BPL) households. \n", "detailedDescription": [{"type": "ol_list", "children": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "In May 2016, the Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas (MOPNG), introduced the \u2018Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana\u2019 (PMUY) as a flagship scheme with an objective to make clean cooking fuel such as LPG available to the rural and deprived households which were otherwise using traditional cooking fuels such as firewood, coal, cow-dung cakes etc. Usage of traditional cooking fuels had detrimental impacts on the health of rural women as well as on the environment. "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The scheme was launched on 1st May 2016 in Ballia, Uttar Pradesh by Hon\u2019ble Prime Minister of India, Shri.
